meanings.definition: Provide with excessive or unnecessary services.
meanings.sent1: The hotel overservices its guests by offering too many amenities.
meanings.sent2: The company overservices its clients by constantly bombarding them with unnecessary offers.
meanings.sent3: The spa overservices its customers by insisting on providing extra treatments even when not needed.
meanings.sent4: The mechanic overservices the car, adding unnecessary repairs that only increase the bill.
meanings.sent5: The restaurant overservices its patrons with an overwhelming number of menu options.

meanings.definition: To offer more services than necessary or requested.
meanings.sent1: The tech support team overservices customers by offering solutions to problems they didn't even know they had.
meanings.sent2: The cleaning company overservices its clients by including additional services without prior approval.
meanings.sent3: The tour guide overservices the group by adding extra stops to the itinerary without consulting them.
meanings.sent4: The online platform overservices users by bombarding them with features they never asked for.
meanings.sent5: The airline overservices passengers by providing amenities that go beyond what was originally promised.
